name: Boulder Town
description:
Relax and enjoy the view of a tiny little town settled in a cosy mountains getting smashed to peaces by giant boulders! Throw everything at them and tear it down to the ground.

Start playing Boulder Town today - join Orbital Knight community loved by millions all over the world.

Follow us to get news and updates:
Facebook: @OrbitalKnight
Twitter: @OrbitalKnight
Instagram: @OrbitalKnight_Crew
